mapper.select: select * from S_XYK_CARD_CUR where CARD_NBR=#{cardNar} and CREATED_TIME=#{createdTime}
mapper.insert: insert into S_XYK_CARD_CUR (CREATED_TIME,CARD_NBR, PRODUCT, CANCL_CODE, CANCL_DAY, CANCL_EMPL, CANCL_TIME, ACTIONCODE, CREATE_DAY, CASHAD_NOX, CASHADV_NO, DESPATCH, EMBOSS_LN2,
